memberdef.name: NET_ADDR_SIZE
memberdef.initializer: MRFI_ADDR_SIZE /* size of address in bytes */

memberdef.name: NWK_CHECK_FOR_SETRX
memberdef.initializer: if (MRFI_RADIO_STATE_RX != s) \ { \ if (MRFI_RADIO_STATE_OFF == s) \ { \ MRFI_WakeUp(); \ } \ MRFI_RxOn(); \ }

memberdef.name: NWK_CHECK_FOR_RESTORE_STATE
memberdef.initializer: if (MRFI_RADIO_STATE_RX != s) \ { \ if (MRFI_RADIO_STATE_OFF == s) \ { \ MRFI_Sleep(); \ } \ else \ { \ MRFI_RxIdle(); \ } \ }
